legacy_items.name: Dragon's Soul Brand
legacy_items.type: A blade forged around the heart of a Draconic Lord of Light, it is a living extension of Rya's power.

evolution.unlock_condition: Found in the Dragon's Graveyard after completing a trial of the Scalebound Clans.

move.name: Lineage Affinity
move.description: The blade adapts to your attuned lineage. When you Unleash Draconic Power, the weapon temporarily gains a tag appropriate to that element (e.g., 'Fire', 'Forceful', 'Freezing').

evolution.unlock_condition: Master the Kaiser Manifestation for the first time.

move.name: Elemental Brand
move.description: The blade now permanently deals +1 harm, and its damage type is always considered the same as your currently attuned lineage (e.g., fire harm, ice harm).

evolution.unlock_condition: Confront the truth of the Shattering and accept the full weight of the draconic legacy.

move.name: Primal Echo
move.description: Once per session, you can unleash the full power of the blade in a wide arc, dealing 3-harm (ap) to all enemies in front of you.

legacy_items.name: Whispering Parallax
legacy_items.type: A blade that seems carved from a tear in reality, humming with the silent energy of the Void.

evolution.unlock_condition: Manifests after Zael confronts the source of the Void's corruption for the first time.

move.name: Shadow Veil
move.description: When you wield this blade, you can use your Weave a Shadow move without cost or consequence.

evolution.unlock_condition: Achieve a Confidant bond with Rya, solidifying his will to protect others.

move.name: Void Tether
move.description: Once per scene, after you deal harm to an enemy, you can link them to you with a tether of shadow. For the next few moments, whenever you take harm, they also take 1-harm.

evolution.unlock_condition: Complete his personal quest, 'The Nature of the Void,' and fully awaken his draconic heritage.

move.name: Silence of the Void
move.description: Once per session, you can plunge the blade into a shadow to silence an enemy. They cannot use any magical abilities or special moves until they are able to act against you directly.

legacy_items.name: Heartwood Scepter
legacy_items.type: A staff crafted from the heartwood of a pre-Shattering tree, capped with a light-infused crystal.

evolution.unlock_condition: Bestowed upon Selra after completing 'The Blighted Grove' quest.

move.name: Mending Light
move.description: When you use Shepherd's Prayer to heal, your target heals 1 additional Harm.

evolution.unlock_condition: Consciously reject the dogma of the Champions of Order in a key narrative moment.

move.name: Shepherd's Sanctuary
move.description: Once per scene, you can plant the scepter in the ground to create an aura of peace. Enemies cannot enter the aura, and allies inside it are immune to fear.

evolution.unlock_condition: Complete her personal quest, 'Selra's Faith,' by defeating a major Champion antagonist.

move.name: Genesis Light
move.description: Once per session, you can call upon the scepter's ultimate power to heal all allies nearby to their full health.

legacy_items.name: Forgeheart
legacy_items.type: The masterwork hammer Torr has spent his life trying to create, forged from the heart of a fallen star.

evolution.unlock_condition: Torr must gather three legendary components from across the world and forge the hammer.

move.name: Perfect Sunder
move.description: When you use your Sunder move, on a 10+, the target's armor is permanently destroyed until it can be repaired at a proper forge.

evolution.unlock_condition: Use the hammer to successfully defend a key Pangolin-kin location or shatter a major piece of enemy war machinery.

move.name: Mountain's Wrath
move.description: Once per scene, you can slam the hammer down to create a shockwave, putting all nearby enemies in a bad spot.

evolution.unlock_condition: Defeat a legendary foe that threatens the existence of the Pangolin-kin people.

move.name: Unbreakable Spirit
move.description: Once per session, when an ally is about to take a devastating blow, you can strike the ground with Forgeheart to negate the attack completely.

legacy_items.name: Heartseed of the First Forest
legacy_items.type: An absorbed artifact; a petrified seed that contains the purest essence of natural life.

evolution.unlock_condition: Found at the cleansed heart of the Gloomwood and absorbed by Sprout.

move.name: Verdant Core
move.description: The seed doubles the healing from your Photosynthesis move.

evolution.unlock_condition: Heal a second major corrupted landmark in the world.

move.name: Gaea's Ward
move.description: Once per scene, you can grant all allies nearby a shield of temporary vitality that can absorb 1 Harm.

evolution.unlock_condition: Channel its full power to shield the party from an otherwise unsurvivable blow.

move.name: One with the World
move.description: Once per session, when an ally is about to be taken out, you can declare that you channel the life force of Eryndor to save them. The harm is negated, but the immense power required leaves you weakened; mark 2 Harm.

legacy_items.name: Alpha's Fang
legacy_items.type: An ancient spear crafted from the fang of a colossal tundra beast, the traditional weapon of the Frostfang Alpha.

evolution.unlock_condition: Reclaimed after defeating the usurper chieftain, Vargus, in a duel for leadership.

move.name: Pack Leader's Scent
move.description: When you deal harm with this spear, your target is marked. The next move made by an ally against that target gets a +1 bonus.

evolution.unlock_condition: Lead the Frostfang pack to victory in a major battle, saving them from a significant external threat.

move.name: Takedown Command
move.description: Once per scene, you can point the spear at a target to grant an ally a clear opening; they get a +2 bonus on their next move against that target.

evolution.unlock_condition: Complete a legendary hunt to defeat a mythical beast that has plagued the Glacial Maw for centuries.

move.name: Wrath of the Great Hunt
move.description: Once per session, you can declare a Great Hunt on a single target. For the rest of the scene, any successful move made against that target by you or your allies also restores their spirit; they may clear 1 Harm.

legacy_items.name: Spiteblade
legacy_items.type: A blade of solidified shadow and malice, coalesced from Garrick's own undying thirst for revenge.

evolution.unlock_condition: Manifests after Garrick fully embraces his wraith form as a weapon of vengeance in the Void Chasm.

move.name: Incorporeal Edge
move.description: This weapon's attacks ignore 1 Armor.

evolution.unlock_condition: Deal a major blow to the Champions of Order, turning his vengeance into tangible results.

move.name: Mark of Betrayal
move.description: Once per scene, you can mark an enemy. For the next few moments, your attacks against that enemy deal +1 harm and are considered psychic.

evolution.unlock_condition: Confront and defeat Grand Inquisitor Valerius.

move.name: Final Vengeance
move.description: Once per session, when you take an enemy out of a scene with this blade, you can immediately take another action.

legacy_items.name: Wind-Piercer
legacy_items.type: A legendary bow of the Skyveil people, said to make arrows fly with the speed of a striking falcon.

evolution.unlock_condition: Earned after completing a legendary trial of the Sky-Reach Aerie.

move.name: True Shot
move.description: This bow never suffers penalties for attacking at extreme distances.

evolution.unlock_condition: Confront and defeat the Arcane Dominion captain who shot her down.

move.name: Gale Arrow
move.description: Once per scene, you can fire an arrow infused with wind. On a hit, it deals +1 harm and forcefully pushes the target back.

evolution.unlock_condition: Save the Sky-Reach Aerie from a major invasion or cataclysm.

move.name: Eye of the Hurricane
move.description: Once per session, you can declare a perfect shot. Your next attack automatically hits as if you rolled a 12+.

legacy_items.name: The Aegis of Memory
legacy_items.type: A crystalline lattice formed around a human soul's most powerful memory—the desperate need to protect.

evolution.unlock_condition: Awakens after Zykar interacts with a key item or location from his past life.

move.name: Memory's Shield
move.description: At the start of any dangerous scene, you gain a shield of temporary vitality that can absorb 1 Harm.

evolution.unlock_condition: Uncover the name and story of the soul trapped within him.

move.name: Guardian's Echo
move.description: Once per scene, when an ally is about to take harm, you can use your reaction to take half of that harm for them.

evolution.unlock_condition: Confront the Dominion scientist who created him and make a defining moral choice.

move.name: Soulfire Rebuke
move.description: Once per session, when you are about to be taken out, you can unleash an explosion of protective energy. You remain in the scene with 1 Harm, and all nearby enemies are terrified and put in a bad spot.

legacy_items.name: Shroud of Echoes
legacy_items.type: A tattered, ghostly shroud that seems woven from solidified mist and lost memories.

evolution.unlock_condition: Reclaimed after appeasing the spirits of her tribe's ancient burial ground.

move.name: Flickering Form
move.description: You are a ghostly, indistinct figure. Any action to attack you from a distance takes a -1 penalty.

evolution.unlock_condition: Uncover a major secret about the Shattering that was thought to be lost forever.

move.name: Fateful Glimpse (Enhancement)
move.description: When you use your Fateful Glimpse move, you hold 1 additional Fate on a 10+.

evolution.unlock_condition: Confront a powerful being that seeks to rewrite history and use the Shroud to preserve the true timeline.

move.name: Oracle's Decree
move.description: Once per session, you can enter a trance. For the next few moments, you can dictate the outcome of a single roll made by any character (ally or enemy), changing it to either a perfect success or a critical failure.

legacy_items.name: World-Root Tendril
legacy_items.type: A living tendril taken from the very heart of the Whispering Woods, a conduit to the raw life force of Eryndor.

evolution.unlock_condition: Gifted by the spirit of the land after Veridia purifies a 'Heart-Spring'.

move.name: Acid Lash
move.description: When you deal harm with this weapon, you can choose to also make the harm acidic, melting your target's armor and leaving them vulnerable.

evolution.unlock_condition: Defeat a major agent of corruption that threatens a significant location outside of her native woods.

move.name: Primal Lash
move.description: Once per scene, when you strike an enemy, you can cause the tendril to erupt with power, either restraining them with 'Overgrowth' or shocking them with a 'Thunderclap' for extra harm.

evolution.unlock_condition: Channel the whip's power to stop a world-altering cataclysm.

move.name: Nature's Wrath
move.description: Once per session, you can command the environment itself to attack a foe (a falling branch, a collapsing riverbank, an angry beast). The foe is automatically taken out of the scene.

legacy_items.name: The Ghost Panther's Claws
legacy_items.type: A pair of perfectly balanced, jet-black daggers that seem to absorb the light around them.

evolution.unlock_condition: Stolen from the legendary 'Onyx Vault' of a rival thieves' guild.

move.name: Paired Strike
move.description: When you Engage in Battle with both daggers, you deal +1 harm.

evolution.unlock_condition: Successfully assassinate a major, high-security target from an enemy faction.

move.name: Ghost Step
move.description: Once per scene, after you hit an enemy with an attack, you can immediately use the Prowl move to hide, even if you are in plain sight.

evolution.unlock_condition: Eliminate a 'legendary' target, thought to be untouchable, without ever being detected.

move.name: Sever Shadow
move.description: Once per session, you can declare a killing blow before you Shadow Strike. If the move is a 10+, you deal double the harm you would normally inflict.

legacy_items.name: The Resonance Core
legacy_items.type: The masterwork power core that houses the fragmented soul of Rune's creator.

evolution.unlock_condition: Integrates with Rune's systems after he interacts with his creator's masterwork forge.

move.name: Power Locus
move.description: Once per scene, you can channel energy to an ally's weapon. For the next few moments, their attacks deal +1 harm and are considered magical.

evolution.unlock_condition: Use his power to defend another 'abomination' (souled construct, peaceful monster, etc.), an act of empathy that resonates with his creator's soul.

move.name: Resonant Guard
move.description: Once per scene, when an ally is about to take harm, you can use your reaction to create a field of protective energy. You both take half the harm.

evolution.unlock_condition: Confront the full truth of his creator's fate and forge a new, unified purpose.

move.name: Creator's Will
move.description: Once per session, you can unleash the core's full power. For the rest of the scene, you and all allies nearby gain a +1 bonus to all rolls.
